How to play:

When a note hits the line and turns white, click the left or right mouse button (depending on which side the note is on) and drag to control either the player (left) or your weapon right).

Try to hit the notes as soon as they touch the line for maximum points.

Enemies (red triangles) deal damage to you. Your weapon also does damage to you, so be careful.

Try to stay alive and get the highest score you can!

NOTE: If you have click-and-drag browser gestured enabled, the game's controls will trigger them. Use a different browser or disable them.

If the game doesn't show up correctly, zoom in.
